# Writing Hi! then a 12x12 image of solid black

00 02 31 06 00 35 31 42 03 48 69 21 00 00 00 00 	..1..51B.Hi!....
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 	................
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 	................
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 	................

# Writing Hi! then a 12x12 image of solid white
00 02 31 06 00 35 31 42 03 48 69 21 00 00 00 00 	..1..51B.Hi!....

# Just the white image
00 02 31 06 00 35 31 42 01 80 00 00 00 00 00 00 	..1..51B.€......

00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 b7 	...............·
02 31 06 c0 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 	.1.À............
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 	................

# Just the black image
00 02 31 06 00 35 31 42 01 80 00 00 00 00 00 00 	..1..51B.€......
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 	................
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 	................
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 	................
00 00 00 00 00 60 02 31 06 40 00 00 00 00 00 00 	.....`.1.@......
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 	................
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 	................
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 	................
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 77 02 31 06 80 00 	..........w.1.€.
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 	................
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 	................

00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 b7 	...............·
02 31 06 c0 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 	.1.À............
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 	................
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 	................
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 	................
00 00 00 00 f7 02 31 0e 00 ff f0 ff f0 ff f0 ff 	....÷.1..ÿðÿðÿðÿ
f0 ff f0 ff f0 ff f0 ff f0 ff f0 ff f0 ff f0 ff 	ðÿðÿðÿðÿðÿðÿðÿðÿ
f0 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 	ð...............

00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 73 02 33 01          	.........s.3.

# An image 72x12 consisting of alternating 12x12 blocks of black and white
00 02 31 06 00 35 31 42 06 80 00 80 01 80 02 80 	..1..51B.€.€.€.€
03 80 04 80 05 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 	.€.€............
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 	................
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 	................
00 00 00 00 00 f4 02 31 06 40 00 00 00 00 00 00 	.....ô.1.@......
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 	................
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 	................
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 	................
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 77 02 31 06 80 00 	..........w.1.€.
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 	................
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 	................
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 	................
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 b7 	...............·
02 31 06 c0 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 	.1.À............
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 	................
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 	................
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 	................
00 00 00 00 f7 02 31 0e 00 ff f0 ff f0 ff f0 ff 	....÷.1..ÿðÿðÿðÿ
f0 ff f0 ff f0 ff f0 ff f0 ff f0 ff f0 ff f0 ff 	ðÿðÿðÿðÿðÿðÿðÿðÿ
f0 00 0f 00 0f 00 0f 00 0f 00 0f 00 0f 00 0f 00 	ð...............
0f 00 0f 00 0f 00 0f 00 0f ff f0 ff f0 ff f0 ff 	.........ÿðÿðÿðÿ
f0 ff f0 ff f0 ff f0 ff f0 9f 02 31 0e 40 ff f0 	ðÿðÿðÿðÿðŸ.1.@ÿð
ff f0 ff f0 ff f0 00 0f 00 0f 00 0f 00 0f 00 0f 	ÿðÿðÿð..........
00 0f 00 0f 00 0f 00 0f 00 0f 00 0f 00 0f ff f0 	..............ÿð
ff f0 ff f0 ff f0 ff f0 ff f0 ff f0 ff f0 ff f0 	ÿðÿðÿðÿðÿðÿðÿðÿð
ff f0 ff f0 ff f0 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 23 02 	ÿðÿðÿð........#.
31 0e 80 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 	1.€.............
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 	................
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 	................
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 	................
00 00 00 bf 02 33 01                            	...¿.3.

# writing a stripped 12x12 

00 02 31 06 00 35 31 42 01 80 00 00 00 00 00 00 	..1..51B.€......
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 	................
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 	................
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 	................
00 00 00 00 00 60 02 31 06 40 00 00 00 00 00 00 	.....`.1.@......
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 	................
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 	................
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 	................
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 77 02 31 06 80 00 	..........w.1.€.
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 	................
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 	................
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 	................
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 b7 	...............·
02 31 06 c0 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 	.1.À............
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 	................
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 	................
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 	................
00 00 00 00 f7 02 31 0e 00 42 10 84 20 08 40 10 	....÷.1..B.„ .@.
80 21 00 42 00 84 00 08 00 10 00 20 00 40 00 80 	€!.B.„..... .@.€
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 	................
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 	................
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 ec 02 33 01          	.........ì.3.
